Interface ShortType

All Superinterfaces:
Mirror, PrimitiveType, Type
public interface ShortType extends PrimitiveType
The type of all primitive short values accessed in the target VM. Calls to Value.type() will return an implementor of this interface.
Since:
1.3
See Also:
  • LongValue
